73911.snapshot: {"_id":"51d7184fb736f6ba180006f4","bongo_":{"constructorName":"JDiscussion"},"slug":"reasonible-disk-space-on-a-vm","title":"Reasonible disk space on a VM","slug_":"reasonible-disk-space-on-a-vm","originId":"4f1f26170017f25c50000062","originType":"JAccount","group":"koding","meta":{"modifiedAt":"2013-07-05T19:02:39.916Z","likes":0,"createdAtEpoch":1373050959,"createdAt":"2013-07-05T19:02:39.000Z"},"body":"Is 1.2G enough space for a VM? I ran out of space today and I don't really have anything on the VM but Google Appengine SDK and a few small projects. TO me maybe including the Ubuntu install in the quota may make 1.2G insufficient for any decent amount of dev...","attachments":[],"repliesCount":0,"opinionCount":3,"counts":{"following":0,"followers":3},"tags":[{"counts":{"tagged":0,"post":40,"developer":3,"following":0,"followers":1656},"title":"Koding","slug_":"koding","slug":"koding","group":"koding","body":"Koding (previously known as \"Kodingen\") is an Online Development Environment owned by Koding, Inc. which allows software developers to program and collaborate online in the browser without the needs of downloading the software development kits in multiple programming languages, including Python, Java, Perl, Node.js, Ruby, C, C++ and Go.","meta":{"createdAtEpoch":1339817523,"createdAt":"2012-06-16T03:32:03.000Z"},"_id":"4fdbfe33645075bb350001a9","name":"JTag","id":"4fdbfe33645075bb350001a9","relationType":"tag","bongo_":{"constructorName":"JTag"}}],"opinions":[{"title":"Not really. If you are a hardcore developer you will want to have a lot of stuff installed, and that takes space. Some developers have 10-100 GB of software installed. But in the future you can buy more space, I think. ","repliesCount":0,"attachments":"","originType":"JAccount","originId":"51d5cc68fefb6a8411000091","body":"Not really. If you are a hardcore developer you will want to have a lot of stuff installed, and that takes space. Some developers have 10-100 GB of software installed. ","meta":{"modifiedAt":"2013-07-05T19:05:42.443Z","likes":0,"createdAtEpoch":1373051142,"createdAt":"2013-07-05T19:05:42.000Z"},"counts":{"following":0,"followers":0},"_id":"51d719064101a73f18000769","name":"JOpinion","id":"51d719064101a73f18000769","relationType":"opinion","bongo_":{"constructorName":"JOpinion"}},{"title":"You will be able to. This stuff costs money afterall hah.","meta":{"modifiedAt":"2013-07-05T19:30:19.967Z","likes":0,"createdAtEpoch":1373052619,"createdAt":"2013-07-05T19:30:19.000Z"},"counts":{"following":0,"followers":0},"_id":"51d71ecb95324f441e0003cd","name":"JOpinion","id":"51d71ecb95324f441e0003cd","relationType":"opinion","bongo_":{"constructorName":"JOpinion"}},{"title":"the 1.2 GB excludes the ubuntu installation - only your modifications count to that quota ;) and yes - buying more disc space will be possible soon","repliesCount":0,"attachments":"","originType":"JAccount","originId":"50323bec836ef318490026d6","body":"the 1.2 GB excludes the ubuntu installation - only your modifications count to that quota ;) and yes - buying more disc space will be possible soon","meta":{"modifiedAt":"2013-07-05T21:45:04.358Z","likes":0,"createdAtEpoch":1373060704,"createdAt":"2013-07-05T21:45:04.000Z"},"counts":{"following":0,"followers":0},"_id":"51d73e600ebfddcd22000464","name":"JOpinion","id":"51d73e600ebfddcd22000464","relationType":"opinion","bongo_":{"constructorName":"JOpinion"}}]}
